common.product_tip: Start your journey of intelligent reading

actions.delete_prompt: Do you want to delete the subscription package {name}? All {length} subscription columns under this subscription package will be removed.

create_or_edit.field_feeds_package_placeholder: Please fill in the name of the subscription group, preferably within 8 Chinese characters.
create_or_edit.tip_modify_failured: Modification failed. Please check if the form fields are filled in correctly. {e}
create_or_edit.tip_footer: Note: Subscription group names should be unique.

actions.delete_prompt: Do you want to delete the subscription {name}?

create_or_edit.field_feed_placeholder: Please fill in the name of the subscription, preferably within 8 Chinese characters.
create_or_edit.field_keywords_placeholder: Please fill in the information keywords. Multiple keywords can be separated by spaces, just like using a search engine.
create_or_edit.field_rss_url_placeholder: Please fill in the RSS address.
create_or_edit.tip_modify_failured: Modification failed. Please check if the form fields are filled in correctly. {e}
create_or_edit.tip_footer: Note: Subscription names should be distinct from existing ones.

tasks.label: Background Tasks
tasks.status_error: Error occurred, click to view details

reader.blank_tip_3: 3.Click on the title of the subscription content.

aisprite.label: AI Companion Reading
aisprite.tip_wait_llm_response: Please wait for Copilot to finish thinking.

default_questions.title: Suggested Questions
default_questions.subtitle: Click a question below to start the conversation

questions.summarize: Please summarize the key points of this article
questions.key_points: What are the key information in this article?
questions.explain_concept: Please explain the important concepts in the article
questions.practical_application: How can this content be applied in practice?
questions.related_topics: What related topics are worth exploring further?
questions.critical_thinking: What different perspectives do you have on this article's viewpoints?

theme.label: Dark Mode
theme.description: Turn on to use the Dark Night, turn off to use the White Moonlight.

section_llm_provider.label: AI Configuration
section_llm_provider.provider_ollama_tip: Ollama can be deployed locally on your device, providing a private model suitable for your hardware device and excellent data privacy and security. You need to install Ollama first.
section_llm_provider.provider_ollama_sentence_4: Please fill in the model name, for example, "qwen2.5:3b"
section_llm_provider.provider_glm_sentence_1: You can register and use the cloud-based AI of GLM. It provides a free GLM Flash model inference service.
section_llm_provider.provider_openai_sentence_1: Most large model services are compatible with OpenAI; just enter the configuration.
section_llm_provider.provider_openai_sentence_2: Enter the large model service URL
section_llm_provider.provider_openai_sentence_3: Enter the API Key authorized by the large model provider
section_llm_provider.provider_barton_sentence_1: (In beta) The self-developed Barton engine has a fast inference speed and extremely low memory usage, and it has excellent data privacy and security

lang.label: Auto-translate to
lang.description: When the content language is different, it will be automatically translated.

option_autostart.label: Launch deamon on System Boot
option_autostart.description: Enabling this option will automatically execute the subscription content update when the system starts. If this option is disabled, you need to manually start the program before the subscription content can be updated automatically.

option_scheduled_fetch.label: Faster Background Update
option_scheduled_fetch.description: Enabling this option helps to update your subscription content more quickly.
